data.name: Christmas Tree Clicker
data.detailed_description:
Here is a Christmas Tree Clicker for your Desktop. The goal of game is to collect all the Toys and earn as many Gifts as possible.

What you can do?


* Earn Gifts by Click&Auto


* Get Gifts with Toys


* Open Gifts with random Toys


* Decorate Christmas Tree by Toys with Drag&Drop


* Additional Gameplay:

  • Easy to learn step by step tutorial
  • Relaxing clicking animation
  • Offline reward
  • Union Toys together for increase solo auto earning and empty space for another Toys
  • Strategic mind for quickly earning Gifts

* Other Features:

  • Extremely low system requirements
  • Best practices Clicker math
  • Light weight background game as a Drag&Drop widget for your Desktop with support of multiscreen systems
  • Deleting saves to reset a game (in Right Mouse Button menu)
  • Start with Windows option (in Right Mouse Button menu)

*Graphics made with support of freepik.com and vecteezy.com

data.short_description: Get Christmas Tree companion for your Desktop! Earn quintillion Gifts, open thousands of this and find all the Toys to decorate your Dream Christmas Tree in the new gambling Clicker!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium D
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
